attributes.additional_details:
To all asthma suffers,
Every 10 seconds someone has a potentially life threatening asthma attack, as this is life threatening illness so why should we have to pay for inhaler prescriptions , I believe this is unfair for people with asthma
And other long term health conditions and I need your help to campaign for an end to prescription charges for long term illnesses

rejection.details: Please see: Abolish prescription charges for asthmatics - The right to breath for free
